title: Continuation of MTA allocation to MTA/WMATIC/WETH Balancer Pool on Polygon
body:
This motion seeks to extend the allocation of 15,000 MTA per week to the [MTA/WMATIC/WETH Balancer Pool](https://polygon.balancer.fi/#/pool/0x614b5038611729ed49e0ded154d8a5d3af9d1d9e00010000000000000000001d) for an additional 10 weeks after the [initial motion for incentivization of 2 weeks passed](https://snapshot.org/#/mstableprotocoldao.eth/proposal/QmXx3ESMX1roEEcgAGc7FD54cMnYyURXmtEzkEoERsNiof). This is in line with other co-incentivization agreements that usually span over 12 weeks. This duration is set as maximum and can be revoked if other opportunities are deemed more attractive or if the incentivization from the third party ends before.

This pool has been shown to attract and bind circulating MTA. It would further allow users to provide liquidity and to swap from and to MTA. 

This allocation is within the 20% that was approved by the earlier proposal [MCCP 7](https://mips.mstable.org/MCCP/mccp-7.html).

**Should we allocate 15,000 MTA per week to this pool for 10 additional weeks?**
author: 0xE76Be9C1e10910d6Bc6b63D8031729747910c2f6
